snippet: The festival runs June 12-19 in Brooklyn, with performances by Thee Oh Sees, Sharon Van Etten, Talib Kweli and hundreds of other acts.
abstract: The festival runs June 12-19 in Brooklyn, with performances by Thee Oh Sees, Sharon Van Etten, Talib Kweli and hundreds of other acts.

headline.main: Chvrches and Titus Andronicus Among Highlights of Northside Festival
headline.print_headline: Titus Andronicus to Play At Northside Festival
